name: dining-hall-tracker
description: Dining hall tracker application with React frontend and Rails API backend

scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.setup:root: rm -rf public app bin config db lib log script spec storage test tmp vendor Gemfile* Rakefile config.ru
scripts.deploy: npm run build:frontend && npm run prepare:backend && npm run copy:frontend:dist && npm run copy:frontend:root && npm run setup:root && npm run copy:backend
